amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds for Executive Orders 13653 and 13693 that require DOD to meet certain green energy mandates and to incorporate climate change reviews within DOD operations, acquisition, and planning.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-571 to prohibit funds for Executive Orders 13653 and 13693 that require DOD to meet certain green energy mandates and to incorporate climate change reviews within DOD operations, acquisition, and planning.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 198 (Roll no. 209).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fleming amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 198 (Roll no. 209).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Fleming.
